Benehair
{'Brand': 'Benehair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.5 x 7 x 0.6 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '765951854224'}
The hair is really itchy. It does not feel like human hair. Gave me a horrible rash on my face and neck
Not human
Umillars 384pc Matte Pure Color Coffin False Nails Artificial Fake nails Full Cover Fingernails 16 Colors & 12 Sizes Nail Tips Kit with One Crystal Nail File for Nail Art Salon DIY Decoration
Umillars
{'Size': '385 Piece Set', 'Material': 'crystal', 'Brand': 'Umillars', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 3 x 3 inches; 3.99 Ounces'}
There thin so I double them up. Add clear coat gel polish and they don’t chip or fade. Lastss up to 2 weeks for me once the top coat is added. Great deal and lost of pretty colors to choose from.
Great price
Cute Fairy Tape In Human Hair Extensions Full Cuticle Seamless Straight Tape Hair Extensions 40g 20Pcs/Pac Dark Brown Highlight with Caramel Blonde Hair Extensions Human Hair 20 inches
cute fairy
{'Brand': 'Cute fairy', 'Color': 'Brown, Caramel blonde', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 3.5 x 0.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '791261180159'}
I ordered 5 bundles and they only sent 4. Then when I mentioned it they refunded me for one instead of sending it. The hair also arrived several days after it was supposed to. I waited until I had the hair installed for at least 2 weeks before leaving this review. The hair is super thin. It thankfully feels thicker once you wash it but I have only washed it twice and it’s already a horrible mess. I don’t use heat on it AT ALL!!! I have slept with it in braids on a silk pillow case since day one.I only use hair extensions approved shampoo and conditioner as well as special leave in oils for moisture. It feels more like heat safe synthetic than human hair.  In my opinion it is not worth the.money at all. The only good thing about the hair is that the tapes have held up beautifully. Other than that I would say a big No to purchasing again. I would return them if I could. Very disappointed. Now I have to celebrate Christmas with a ratty nest on my head because my hair dresser is out of town until after New Years. Save your troubles and money. Go with a different brand.
Don’t do it. I want my money back :(
SEGO Nano Ring Hair Extensions Human Hair Balayage Nano Beads Pre-bonded Seamless Hairpieces Loop Hand Tied Nano Tip Remy Hair Highlight Hair for Women 1g/strand 50g/pack -24 Inch -2 Dark Brown
SEGO
{'Brand': 'SEGO', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '13.5 x 7.68 x 0.71 inches; 2.89 Ounces'}
It’s hard to see from the photo but the hair after 1 wash keeps getting matted underneath really bad. I followed all care instructors correctly. I can brush them out and they will be ok for a half hour or so and then right back to tangled and matted. Disappointed. I bought 5 bundles and spent a lot of money. So itchy too. Ugh. I need to stop buying cheaper hair.also very thin. Second Photo is the ends of 5 bundles installed. Very thin ends.
Bad quality after first wash
Anihiho Tape in Hair Extensions Human Hair Straight Hair Extensions Tape in Real Human Hair Tape in Hair Extensions for Women (14 Inch 30g , Jet Black)
Anihiho
{'Brand': 'Anihiho', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Package Dimensions': '6.97 x 4.69 x 0.63 inches; 2.08 Ounces'}
I have been wearing tape extensions for years. I have tried so many brands on Amazon and eBay and up until now, have never been satisfied. I have had these installed for 2 weeks and I must say, the hair is amazing. I have washed it and it still feels so good. It doesn’t tangle at all so far. It’s not itchy either. And the color matches my hair perfectly. My only issue I have had so far is the tapes are horrible. I had them professionally installed and after 4 days I went to wash my hair and as soon as my hair was soaked they all started sliding out. I hadn’t even used any product yet. The tapes basically Disintegrated because there wasn’t even any residue left in my hair. I have never had that happen before. So you might want to retape before applying them. I retaped them and put them back in and have had no issues thus far. Definitely recommend them. The tapes may suck but the hair is amazing. I will only order from this brand from now on.
Best extensions on Amazon but tapes suck
HAIRCUBE Long Straight Blonde Wigs for Women Ombre Wigs Mid-partition Heat Resistance Synthetic Hair Natural Looking for Daily Party Use(Ash Blonde)
HAIRCUBE
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'HAIRCUBE', 'Package Dimensions': '10.91 x 8.54 x 2.01 inches; 12.31 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LC462'}
This wig isn’t the worst i have had but its also not the best. Don’t get me wrong it will work good for cosplay or dress up fun but I can’t see myself using it outside of the house. The wig is unrealistic at the roots and front and it feels similar to costume wigs for Halloween. It is pretty but you can get better synthetic wigs on amazon.
It’s ok for coslay or dress u, not so much for daily use

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus**: The user remains primarily focused on hair extensions, particularly tape-in styles, expressing mixed feelings about recent purchases. They continue to show enthusiasm for false nails for nail art and DIY decoration, with a new interest in colorful makeup products.
- **Material Sensitivity**: There is still a preference for genuine human hair extensions, with an increasing criticality regarding quality after a recent experience with a synthetic wig. Additionally, the user has noted some sensitivity to eye products, as indicated by a recent interaction with eyeliners that caused slight irritation.
- **Quality Expectations**: The emphasis on high-quality hair extensions continues, particularly regarding durability and minimal tangling. The user has also shown a discerning view on makeup products, requiring multiple layers for satisfactory results while expecting comfortable wear.
- **Length Preference**: The user continues to favor longer extensions, typically exceeding 18 inches, aiming for styles that enhance their look.
- **Comfort Level**: Comfort is a primary concern, with past issues noted regarding textures in hair products. Although recent purchases improved this, the user experienced some discomfort with eye products that caused minor irritation.
- **Overall Satisfaction**: The user exhibits moderating satisfaction with hair extensions, maintaining critical views on synthetic alternatives. Meanwhile, they show a positive outlook on nail products and a cautious yet explorative approach toward makeup.
- **Rating Trends**: Their cautious purchasing behavior is evident, reflected in balanced ratings, with a discerning approach toward both hair and makeup products based on varied experiences.
